columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the add-on.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The date and time that the add-on was created.

columns.name: modified_at
columns.description: The date and time that the add-on was last modified.

columns.name: service_account_role_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that is bound to the Kubernetes service account used by the add-on.

columns.name: health_issues
columns.description: An object that represents the add-on's health issues.

columns.name: tags
columns.description: The metadata that you apply to the cluster to assist with categorization and organization.
